Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Hussitenlied, S. 234

1840 · LW A67 · R. 100

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a song by Theodor Krov. Liszt precedes his arrangement with a version littérale, which can be played or omitted.

Liszt also made an arrangement for piano duet (S. 620; LW B3; R. 308).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/8 · Z. A/B 12394 · Free Arrangements V · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
